description: This CSS file defines styles for a web application, including variables for light and dark themes, layout styles for the main application, animations, and responsive design tweaks.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the application's root container, including background color and text color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the logo of the application, including height and pointer events.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header of the application, including background color, layout properties, and font size.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background color, and hover effects.
